name: Connect In People 🇫🇷/🇬🇧
description:
A 5 minutes narrative game where you will connect people between them. Find what Henri will to Joséphine. Available in 🇫🇷 and 🇬🇧.

This game was made for the Godot Wild jam #21 in a week by Nutriz and Pinky with Godot Engine 3.2.2-beta. The theme was Connection.

Source code available at https://github.com/Nutriz/GodotWildJam21
